review: OMG, I love this!  Easy to use... great styling, nice feeling remote.  Much more than what I thought it was.  Thrilled with this purchase. Highly recommend this item, especially if you're a Prime member.  Much easier than watching from computer.  Wide variety of items and oh, Sling TV is also very good. review: Finally decided to cut the cord after many years with Direct TV. This box is great if you're a Prime subscriber. Would like to see more included movies, but between Prime and Netflix there are a lot of options. Plus it has a kid mode that you can set times and access for the little ones. Overall this is a great option.

review: I didn't know what to expect with this purchase but I have grown to love it! Honestly the remote with the mic is worth spending extra for. I'm so obsessed with the remote; it feels nice, the layout just makes sense, and it's so easy to use! I don't use this for any games really but mostly just watching Prime shows and movies and the movies I have on my Flixter account! I hardly ever have any buffering issues or quality problems. The box itself is so tiny and cute and doesn't seem to heat up very much while it's running! If you've got Prime or even Netflix, I'd recommend this. If you're on the fence about buying this, the remote is so worth it. I can't oversell that enough; I love it! I have larger hands, too, and the size isn't a problem. Everyone in my family loves using it!

review: The fire stick is so much fun to have. Having access to HBO is fantastic. The other things that Amazon offers on the prime is just fun. I refuse to pay for cable, we have Comcast and AT & T here and they are so overpriced, and I simply refuse to pay the overpriced charges.  Right now we are watching a lot of HBO and PBS. Hand of God was riveting, hey Amazon make more of Hand of God. The fire stick at $39.00 is a such a small price to pay to have access to all prime offers. The set up is extremely easy, but the remote is a problem. It is small but opening the battery compartment really sucks. I cannot open it, so I have my husband do it. The remote needs to be reconfigured for the battery compartment. It is poorly designed. I would recommend purchasing this.
